Hi!DibyaTPB congratulations, you've just climbed into the top 100!
Hey Dibya,congratulations, you've just climbed into the top 100!

Download and install winrar.

Go to the folder where the movie downloaded to your computer.

Click Organize.

Click Folder ans Search Options

Click the view tab

Uncheck Hide extensions for known file types

Click Apply 

Click OK

Double click Har00.rar

Drag and drop the movie file inside Har00.rar to any folder and wait for it to extract.

Play movie file.
